fields.name: AddressSpace
fields.description: The AddressSpace that contains an array of IP address ranges that can be used by subnets.

fields.name: BgpCommunities
fields.description: Bgp Communities sent over ExpressRoute with each route corresponding to a prefix in this VNET.

fields.name: DhcpOptions
fields.description: The dhcpOptions that contains an array of DNS servers available to VMs deployed in the virtual network.

fields.name: EnableDdosProtection
fields.description: Indicates if DDoS protection is enabled for all the protected resources in the virtual network. It requires a DDoS protection plan associated with the resource.

fields.name: EnableVMProtection
fields.description: Indicates if VM protection is enabled for all the subnets in the virtual network.

fields.name: Encryption
fields.description: Indicates if encryption is enabled on virtual network and if VM without encryption is allowed in encrypted VNet.

fields.name: FlowLogs
fields.description: A collection of references to flow log resources.

fields.name: FlowTimeoutInMinutes
fields.description: The FlowTimeout value (in minutes) for the Virtual Network

fields.name: IPAllocations
fields.description: Array of IpAllocation which reference this VNET.

fields.name: ResourceGuid
fields.description: The resourceGuid property of the Virtual Network resource.

fields.name: Subnets
fields.description: A list of subnets in a Virtual Network.

fields.name: VirtualNetworkPeerings
fields.description: A list of peerings in a Virtual Network.
